stories.title: Show HN: Email encoder – protect your public emails from bots and crawlers

stories.text:
I'm temporarily in New York City for 3 months looking for work (if anyone wants a good technical manager see my profile) and I travel really light. My laptop (a surface tablet) is great except for some heavy desktop usage. I definitely don't want to buy a desktop or full laptop here due to traveling soon but I was wondering if there is a good paid powerful remote virtual machine I can rent for desktop type of usage, like a remote desktop as a service? My budget is ideally $50-$100/month but could go a little higher.

What is your recommendation?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a good paid remote desktop workstation as a service solution?
Usborne 1980s Computer Books Available as Free PDFs

stories.text:
As an Irish we don't have nuclear but we had been given tablets (the name escapes me now but I think iodine) based on a plant that was in the UK. Apperantly we were downwind.

As a family we had to learn and memorize where those tablets where. Chernobyl was around the same time.

There might be a stigma built. But what are the facts?

Full disclosure: incase I was not clear I'm pro nuclear.
stories.title: Ask HN: Why is Germany so anti nuclear?
My College Side Project: Gather – A way to consolidate event information

stories.text:
Every problem has a solution. Or maybe gazillions of solutions. But finding the right solution is not easy. I am building a catalog of B2B products for businesses to easily find and compare solutions for their problems at one place. If you are building a B2B product, please add it to the sheet using this form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSefl_pJUk40lwLEzXIZgOuXUamnlIk8JQjQ_llprpeyFOfAbg/viewform?usp=sf_link

Use this sheet to search for a solution to your problem: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1H4SDFjO_J9pxpQ-7Xni2OP53ztM_2GOv_uIRniRYpnM/edit?usp=sharing

Hope it will be a bridge between indie makers and other businesses. I am planning to build a website if the sheet gets enough response. It'll help reach more businesses without SEO BS and all. Your feedback and suggestions are welcome.
stories.title: Ask HN: Help me build this catalog of B2B products
